data.actual_result: Sprotify Status will not show unless a user navigates to another playlist containing only non imported songs.
data.expected_result: Spotify Status message should display for any non imported song regardless if the playlist is purely non imported or has a mixture of imported and non imported songs.
data.short_description: "Spotify Status will not display for valid song when in a Playlist that has a mix of imported and non imported songs.
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1: Navigate to a Playlist that does not have imported songs and play a song. <:greenTick:312314752711786497> Spotify status should display.Step 2: Now navigate to a playlist that has a mix of imported and non imported songs.Step 3: Play a imported song. Either the Discord status will show the old non imported song playing, or will not show the status. Step 4: Play a non imported song in the same playlist. <:redTick:312314733816709120> Spotify status does not display. Additionally, Navigating to another playlist that ONLY has non imported songs will cause that status to show.
